name: Super Metroid: Rulers of Ruin
overview: Here is a short hack which was entered into a contest which has some nice graphical edits and some ASM changes to Ridley. Items to Get: Morphball, Bombs, charge, Wave, Gravity Suit, 2 Missle Tanks (70 each pack) 2 Super Missle Tank, 2 E-Tanks (Gives a neeto amount of health each...) Power Bombs (1 Tank) And Speed Booster.
